briefdescription.para: Gets or set custom barcode generator.
Gets or sets paths of MS Word built-in templates.

detaileddescription.para: This property is used by the FieldAutoText and FieldGlossary fields, if referenced auto text entry is not found in the AttachedTemplate template.

By default MS Word stores built-in templates in c:\Users\<username>\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\Document Building Blocks\1033\16\Built-In Building Blocks.dotx and C:\Users\<username>\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\Templates\Normal.dotm files.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the field comparison expressions evaluator.
Gets or sets the current user information.
Gets or sets custom style separator for the \t switch in FieldToc field.
Gets or sets default document author's name. If author's name is already specified in built-in document properties, this option is not considered.
Gets a provider that returns a query result for the FieldDatabase field.
Gets or sets a FieldIndexFormat that represents the formatting for the FieldIndex fields in the document.
Gets or sets a provider that returns a culture object specific for each particular field.

detaileddescription.para: The provider is requested when the value of FieldUpdateCultureSource is FieldUpdateCultureSource.FieldCode.
If the provider is present, then the culture object it returns is used for the field update. Otherwise, a system culture is used.

briefdescription.para: Specifies what culture to use to format the field result.

detaileddescription.para: By default, the culture of the current thread is used.
The setting affects only date/time fields with \\@ format switch.

briefdescription.para: Gets IFieldUpdatingCallback implementation.
Gets or sets the file name of the document.

detaileddescription.para: This property is used by the FieldFileName field with higher priority than the OriginalFileName property.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the value indicating whether bidirectional text is fully supported during field update or not.

detaileddescription.para: When this property is set to true, additional steps are performed to produce Right-To-Left language (i.e. Arabic or Hebrew) compatible field result during its update.
When this property is set to false and Right-To-Left language is used, correctness of field result after its update is not guaranteed.
The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the value indicating whether legacy (early than AW 13.10) number format for fields is enabled or not.

detaileddescription.para: When this property is set to true, template symbol "#" worked as in .net: Replaces the pound sign with the corresponding digit if one is present; otherwise, no symbols appears in the result string.

When this property is set to false, template symbol "#" works as MS Word: This format item specifies the requisite numeric places to display in the result. If the result does not include a digit in that place, MS Word displays a space. For example, { = 9 + 6 \# $### } displays $ 15.
The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the culture to preprocess field values.

detaileddescription.para: Currently this property only affects value of the FieldDocProperty field.
The default value is null. When this property is set to null, the FieldDocProperty field's value is preprocessed with the culture controlled by the FieldUpdateCultureSource property.

briefdescription.para: Allows to control how the field result is formatted.
Gets or sets the file name of the template used by the document.

detaileddescription.para: This property is used by the FieldTemplate field if the AttachedTemplate property is empty.
If this property is empty, the default template file name Normal.dotm is used.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the table of authorities categories.
Gets or sets the value indicating that number format is parsed using invariant culture or not.

detaileddescription.para: When this property is set to true, number format is taken from an invariant culture.
When this property is set to false, number format is taken from the current thread's culture.
The default value is false.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the respondent to user prompts during field update.

detaileddescription.para: If the value of this property is set to null, the fields that require user response on prompting (such as FieldAsk or FieldFillIn) are not updated.
The default value is null.

briefdescription.para: Gets or set custom barcode generator.

Setter for Aspose::Words::Fields::FieldOptions::get_LegacyNumberFormat.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Fields::FieldOptions::get_PreProcessCulture.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Fields::FieldOptions::get_ResultFormatter.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Fields::FieldOptions::get_TemplateName.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Fields::FieldOptions::get_ToaCategories.

Represents options to control field handling in a document.
